imgSrc.title: Citrus

imgSrc.title: Fruity

imgSrc.title: Floral
imgSrc.detail: Heady, exotic and intoxicating. Rich, full-bodied florals are the essence of femininity.

imgSrc.title: Spicy
imgSrc.detail: Aromatic and fresh. From warm and sensual spices, to cool and vibrant. Spicy fragrances draw you in.

imgSrc.title: Woody
imgSrc.detail: Earthy, aromatic and grounding. Woody scents have intriguing, individualistic characters.
